mapper.select: SELECT c.bno, b.fname, c.btitle, a.mname, c.bwrite_date, c.bsigner, c.bsign_date FROM Member a, Form b, Board c WHERE a.mno = c.mno and b.fno = c.fno ORDER BY c.bno;
SELECT c.nno, b.fname, c.ntitle, a.mname, c.nwrite_date FROM Member a, Form b, Notice c WHERE a.mno = c.mno and b.fno = c.fno ORDER BY c.nno;
